member.name: IMediaRenderer.add_RenderingParametersUpdate

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, Windows Media Streaming API, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by Media Casting. Media Casting has been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use Media Casting instead of Windows Media Streaming API, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Registers an event handler for the RenderingParametersUpdate event.

member.param: A RenderingParametersUpdateHandler event handler function.
Reference to a token that can be used to unregister the event handler.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.add_TransportParametersUpdate

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, Windows Media Streaming API, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by Media Casting. Media Casting has been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use Media Casting instead of Windows Media Streaming API, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Registers an event handler for the TransportParametersUpdate event.

member.param: A TransportParametersUpdateHandler event handler function.
Reference to a token that can be used to unregister the event handler.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.GetMuteAsync
member.summary: Queries the DMR asynchronously to determine if audio is currently muted or unmuted.
member.param: Receives a reference to a GetMuteOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.GetPositionInformationAsync
member.summary: Queries the DMR asynchronously to retrieve position information.
member.param: Receives a reference to a GetPositionInformationOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.GetTransportInformationAsync
member.summary: Queries the DMR asynchronously to retrieve transport information.
member.param: Receives a reference to a GetTransportInformationOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.GetVolumeAsync
member.summary: Queries the DMR asynchronously for its current audio volume level.
member.param: Receives a reference to a GetVolumeOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.PauseAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to pause playing the current content.
member.param: Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.PlayAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to play the content that was specified by calling the SetSourceFromUriAsync, SetSourceFromStreamAsync, or SetSourceFromMediaSourceAsync method.
member.param: Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.PlayAtSpeedAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to play the content that was specified by calling the SetSourceFromUriAsync, SetSourceFromStreamAsync, or SetSourceFromMediaSourceAsync method at the specified rate.
member.param: The rate at which the DMR will be instructed to play the content. This value must correspond to one of the values returned by the IMediaRendererActionInformation.PlaySpeeds method.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.remove_RenderingParametersUpdate
member.summary: Unregisters an event handler for the RenderingParametersUpdate event.
member.param: A reference to a token obtained from the add_RenderingParametersUpdate method when the event handler was registered.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.remove_TransportParametersUpdate
member.summary: Unregisters an event handler for the TransportParametersUpdate event.
member.param: A reference to a token obtained from the add_TransportParametersUpdate method when the event handler was registered.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SeekAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to seek to a particular time offset.
member.param: A TimeSpan value that specifies the seek offset. This value must be 0 (indicating the beginning of the content) or greater, but less than the value of PositionInformation.TrackDuration which is obtained by calling GetPositionInformationAsync.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SetMuteAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to either mute or unmute the audio.
member.param: A reference to a boolean value that specifies the mute setting. A value of True specifies that mute is turned on, and a value of False specifies that it is turned off.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SetNextSourceFromMediaSourceAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to prepare the specified content for playing once the current content has finished playing.
member.param: A reference to an interface implementing . The IMFActivate interface is used to query for an interface that represents the media source.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SetNextSourceFromStreamAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to prepare the specified media stream for playing once the current content has finished playing.
member.param: A reference to an interface implementing . The IMFActivate interface is used to query for an interface that represents the media stream.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SetNextSourceFromUriAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to prepare the content identified by the specified URI for playing once the current content has finished playing.
member.param: An HSTRING containing the file path or resource location of media content.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SetSourceFromMediaSourceAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to prepare the specified content for playing.
member.param: A reference to an interface implementing . The IMFActivate interface is used to query for an interface that represents the media source.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SetSourceFromStreamAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to prepare the specified media stream for playing.
member.param: A reference to an interface implementing . The IMFActivate interface is used to query for an interface that represents the media stream.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SetSourceFromUriAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to prepare the content identified by the specified URI for playing.
member.param: An HSTRING containing the file path or resource location of media content.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.SetVolumeAsync
member.summary: Sets the audio volume level on the DMR asynchronously to the specified value.
member.param: A reference to the specified volume value. The value must be in the range of 0 to 100, with 0 being the minimum volume and 100 being the maximum volume.
Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer.StopAsync
member.summary: Instructs the DMR asynchronously to stop playing the current content.
member.param: Receives a reference to a PlaybackOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRenderer
member.summary: Encapsulates the methods and events needed to represent a DLNA Digital Media Renderer (DMR) device.
